005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.UuidItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013
014import java.util.UUID;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017
018/**
019 * An atomic Metapath item containing a UUID data value.
020 */
021public interface IUuidItem extends IStringItem {
022  /**
023   * Get the type information for this item.
024   *
025   * @return the type information
026   */
027  @NonNull
028  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IUuidItem> type() {
029    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.UUID.getItemType();
030  }
031
032  @Override
033  default IAtomicOrUnionType<IUuidItem> getType() {
034    return type();
035  }
036
037  /**
038   * Construct a new UUID item using the provided string {@code value}.
039   *
040   * @param value
041   *          a string representing a UUID
042   * @return the new item
043   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
044   *           if the given string violates RFC4122
045   */
046  @NonNull
047  static IUuidItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
048    try {
049      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.UUID.parse(value));
050    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
051      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
052          null,
053          String.format("Invalid UUID value '%s'. %s",
054              value,
055              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
056          ex);
057    }
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Construct a new item using the provided {@code value}.
062   *
063   * @param value
064   *          a UUID value
065   * @return the new item
066   */
067  @NonNull
068  static IUuidItem valueOf(@NonNull UUID value) {
069    return new UuidItemImpl(value);
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Generate a random UUID value.
074   *
075   * @return the generated UUID item
076   */
077  @SuppressWarnings("null")
078  @NonNull
079  static IUuidItem random() {
080    return valueOf(UUID.randomUUID());
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
085   *
086   * @param item
087   *          the item to cast
088   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
089   *         cast to this type
090   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
091   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
092   */
093  @NonNull
094  static IUuidItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
095    try {
096      return item instanceof IUuidItem
097          ? (IUuidItem) item
098          : valueOf(item.asString());
099    } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
100      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
101      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
102    }
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Get the "wrapped" UUID value.
107   *
108   * @return the underlying UUID value
109   */
110  @NonNull
111  UUID asUuid();
112
113  @Override
114  default IUuidItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
115    return cast(item);
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Compares this value with the argument.
120   *
121   * @param item
122   *          the item to compare with this value
123   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
124   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
125   */
126  default int compareTo(@NonNull IUuidItem item) {
127    return asUuid().compareTo(item.asUuid());
128  }
129
130  @Override
131  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem other) {
132    return compareTo(other.asStringItem());
133  }
134}
